message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI

This paper is likely to belong to the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) because it deals with speech recognition systems and the automatic acquisition of pronunciations for words. It may also belong to the sub-category of Sound and Music Computing (cs.SD) because it deals with acoustic evidence. Additionally, it could be categorized under Machine Learning (cs.LG) because it proposes a method for learning a lexicon. Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Speech Processing (cs.SI) are also possible sub-categories because of the focus on speech recognition and language processing.
